name: Main Template
format:
A heading

A paragraph.

name: Our Motivation
format:
Food or perishables as we all know, are as basic a need as the air we breathe in. India, having majority of its deep seated roots embedded within the agro and it's subsidiary industries produces enough to feed a population of around 140 crore and counting. India ranks second, to China, in it's annual Wheat production scale (99.70 million tonnes.) The amount of Milk produced annually being 173.3 milion tonnes and that of Rice being 117.47 million tonnes. Yet, India is ranked at 102 out of 117 countries as per the World Hunger Index, falling behind all of her neighbours. There is a plethora of reasons behind this poor performance, ranging from miniscule to giganormous in size, but the most essential of them all being the amount of food that is wasted in India, each year. According to the UN's Food and Agricultural Organization, a massive one third of the total amount of food produced globally is wasted, which is worth over $750 billion. India currently ranks 7th in terms of overall food wastage.

Wastage causes a critically hampered demand-supply chain, with demands exponentially greater than supplies causing food prices to skyrocket and therefore remain off of shelves for most of the people in the economically weaker sections of the society.

Thus, we here at The Czar's have developed an ingenious way to curb our wastage, doing our bit for the society that we live in. We shall be using Machine Learning as a tool for our endeavour to curb the wastage of perishables. By predicting the amount of orders we might receive in the upcoming weeks (upto 10 weeks advance) from past trends of our business dealings, we sincerely hope to cut down our wastage to a bare minimum.

name: Essential Data
format:
There are two excel sheets provided here for the understanding of the user of this web application. It is not always possible for a user to remember or carry a copy of the IDs at his or her disposal, thus a readily made directory will largely help the user and thereby increase the efficiency.

The user might refer, at any time during the session, to the tables of:

1) Centre ID

2) Meal ID

for filling up the required form in the latter part of the page.

name: Youtube videos
format: In case you're not in the mood to read lengthy articles, we've got you covered with some amazing videos to keep you informed fellow Foodie!

name: News
format:
Hello there Foodpreneur and Foodista!

Let's catch up on some daily update from the world of food. Shall we?

name: The Czar bot info
format:
Hello there fellow foodie!

I, The Czar Bot have been meticulously designed to answer any query that might arise in your mind, while you surf through the web application.

Apart from basic greetings and courtesies, I can also give you some tips for the upcoming months. I believe I'm an exeptional stand up comic, so don't shy away from asking for a joke. I can provide you with the stock lists and shelf life information for the stored items as well.

Let's find out what else I can do! Don't forget to ask me "how I am!" after all, mental health is important.

name: Prediciton info
format: This tab will give you prediction of number of orders for the week you enter and the subsequent 10 weeks' worth of order in advance.
